short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Sets a custom browser home page.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Replace the new tab page with STAYC, weather, to-do list, and more!
Now you can choose background images from the list of available ones. Also added localization in Korean, Japanese, Chinese, Russian, Ukrainian and French.
